Description: Limestone ostracon containing a religious text in Greek, with stops and accents, on the front, and a religious text in Coptic on the back, in a smaller hand.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.23, pl.17)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (65424) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/65424)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 17:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
